My favourite ice cream shop went out of business last summer.
The ice cream truck played a catchy tune to attract customers.
I added a scoop of chocolate ice cream to my glass of milk for an extra creamy texture.
She scooped ice cream into a bowl using a spoon.
words.defineEn: a sweet and cold dessert that is made from a mixture of milk, cream, sugar, and various flavorings
words.defineVi: một món tráng miệng ngọt và lạnh được làm từ hỗn hợp sữa, kem, đường và các hương liệu khác nhau

examples: We snacked on crispy roasted adzuki beans by the riverside.
Try some dried apricots as a healthy snack.
A complimentary afternoon snack is served to all guests.
He ate an orange carrot for a snack.
They snacked on a handful of mixed nuts for an energy boost during their hike.
words.defineEn: a small meal that is usually eaten between the main meals or when there is not much time for cooking
words.defineVi: một bữa ăn nhỏ thường được ăn giữa các bữa ăn chính hoặc khi không có nhiều thời gian để nấu ăn

examples: The little boy ate biscuits and drank lemonade until he was as full as a tick.
Huckleberry jam is a popular spread for toast and biscuits.
Baking powder helped the biscuits achieve a perfect rise and a tender crumb.
We have all had bad break-ups but this seem to take the biscuit.
He discovered that shortening was the secret ingredient for achieving a perfect flaky texture in his biscuits.
words.defineEn: a soft cake that is small and round
words.defineVi: một chiếc bánh mềm nhỏ và tròn

examples: The chocolate mousse had a velvety consistency thanks to carrageen.
I baked a chocolate cake for my friend's birthday.
The chocolate is available by mail order, but at a price.
The unique flavor of physalis pairs wonderfully with dark chocolate in desserts.
he broke off a piece of his chocolate.
words.defineEn: a type of food that is brown and sweet and is made from ground cocoa seeds
words.defineVi: một loại thực phẩm có màu nâu và ngọt và được làm từ hạt ca cao xay

examples: Crisp up halloumi in a hot pan and use it as a topping for homemade pizzas.
Cerrado pears are known for their unique flavor and crisp texture.
I like the mild spiciness and crisp texture that green pepper adds to my omelettes.
She prepared a delightful crab salad, combining chunks of sweet crab meat with crisp vegetables.
She carefully skinned the apple with a sharp knife, revealing its crisp flesh.
words.defineEn: a thin, round piece of potato, cooked in hot oil and eaten cold as a snack
words.defineVi: một miếng khoai tây tròn, mỏng, nấu trong dầu nóng và ăn nguội như một món ăn nhẹ

examples: She is a hard nut
The squirrel was running with a small nut in its mouth.
The problem is a hard nut to crack.
The team's defense is a tough nut to crack.
She carefully arranged a selection of kola nuts on a decorative plate.
words.defineEn: a small fruit with a seed inside a hard shell that grows on some trees
words.defineVi: một quả nhỏ có hạt bên trong vỏ cứng mọc trên một số cây

examples: My friend prefers a vegetarian sandwich with avocado and sprouts.
That bacon sandwich really hit the spot!
The street vendor served crispy chicken cutlet sandwiches with lettuce and mayonnaise.
We packed sandwiches for our picnic in the park.
you want a knuckle sandwich?
words.defineEn: two pieces of bread with cheese, meat, etc. between them
words.defineVi: hai miếng bánh mì với phô mai, thịt, v.v... ở giữa

examples: Sleep well and sweet dreams.
Her aunt is very sweet but not all there.
I enjoyed the sweet scent of blossoms on the flowering tree.
but she was sweet as pie.
A slice of sweet orange adds a delightful touch to a cold glass of iced tea.
words.defineEn: containing sugar or having a taste that is like sugar
words.defineVi: chứa đường hoặc có hương vị giống như đường

examples: The food looks good.
Save some food for me.
Food went missing from the school cafeteria?
The leaves of Morus alba are commonly used as food.
Spiders can live for several days without food.
words.defineEn: things that people and animals eat, such as meat or vegetables
words.defineVi: những thứ mà con người và động vật ăn, chẳng hạn như thịt hoặc rau

examples: The children drank their juice from colorful plastic glasses.
My parents always drink orange juice for breakfast.
Get a drink for John.
I usually drink a cup of green tea in the afternoon.
My brother always drinks smoothie after exercising.
words.defineEn: to put water, coffe, or other type of liquid inside of our body through our mouth
words.defineVi: để đưa nước, cà phê, hoặc loại chất lỏng khác bên trong cơ thể của chúng tôi thông qua miệng của chúng tôi

examples: I eat pizza on Wednesdays.
The children scarfed down the pizza at the birthday party.
We ordered takeout pizza for an easy dinner.
Make a rustic mushroom pizza with chanterelles and fresh herbs.
I draw the line at a pizza with anchovies on it.

examples: I sell mineral water.
Don’t use mineral water, because that stuff is full of things that will act as nucleation sites.
Correct, in 2010, I received my certification as a mineral water sommelier from the German Water Association.
words.defineEn: water from underground that contains minerals and gasses, usually bottled and sold
